name: Jungle Isles
description:
Controls

  • W - Open Weapon inventory
  • E - Open Trinket inventory
  • R - Open Survivor inventory
  • L - Open Loadout
  • D - Show details about the expedition members
  • Right click - Close all inventories
  • Ctrl + left click - Move stuff between inventories
  • Shift + left click - Move stuff from/to backpack

There is a game time slider for speeding up an expedition down left.
